mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post VALUES ( ( SELECT nvl(MAX(post_id) + 1,1) FROM post ), SYSDATE, #{post_title}, #{post_content}, 'no', #{cate_id}, #{mem_id}, ( SELECT nvl(MAX(post_id) + 1,1) FROM post ), 1, 0 )
mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from ( SELECT post_id, post_time, post_title, post_content, post_delete, cate_id, mem_id, REF, re_step, re_level FROM post WHERE cate_id = #{cate_id} ORDER BY REF DESC, re_step ASC ) a ) where rn >= (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 and rn <= #{page}*#{pageSize}
select count(*) from post where cate_id=#{cate_id} and post_delete='no'
mapper.update: update post set post_delete='yes' where post_id=#{post_id}
